original_text: The priest shall then put on his linen clothes, with linen undergarments next to his body, and shall remove the ashes of the burnt offering that the fire has consumed on the altar and place them beside the altar.
korean_text: 제사장은 세마포 긴 옷을 입고 세마포 속바지로 하체를 가리고 제단 위에서 불태운 번제의 재를 가져다가 제단 곁에 두고

sentences.original_text: The priest shall then put on his linen clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그의 린넨 옷을 입어야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: with linen undergarments next to his body
and shall remove the ashes of the burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 번제물의 재를 제거해야 할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that the fire has consumed on the altar
and place them beside the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 단 옆에 두어야 할 것입니다
